SEARCH
Package com.fdm.Pinance.service

Class AccountBalanceService

java.lang.Object
com.fdm.Pinance.service.AccountBalanceService
@Service public class AccountBalanceService extends Object
Service class that provides business logic and operations for managing AccountBalance entities.

    • createAccount

      public AccountBalance createAccount(User user)
      Creates a new AccountBalance entity and associates it with the provided User.
      Parameters:
      user - The User entity to associate with the new AccountBalance.
      Returns:
      The newly created AccountBalance entity.

    • getAccountById

      public AccountBalance getAccountById(Long id)
      Retrieves an AccountBalance entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the AccountBalance to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The AccountBalance entity with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getAccountByUsername

      public AccountBalance getAccountByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves an AccountBalance entity by the username of its associated User.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the User associated with the AccountBalance.
      Returns:
      The AccountBalance entity associated with the specified username, or null if not found.

    • getAllAccounts

      public List<AccountBalance> getAllAccounts()
      Retrieves a list of all AccountBalance entities.
      Returns:
      A list of all AccountBalance entities in the database.

      Updates an existing AccountBalance entity.
      Parameters:
      account - The AccountBalance entity to update.
      Returns:
      The updated AccountBalance entity.

    • deleteAccount

      public void deleteAccount(Long accountId)
      Deletes an AccountBalance entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      accountId - The ID of the AccountBalance to delete.

    • depositUSD

      public void depositUSD(String username, BigDecimal amount)
      Deposits the specified amount of USD into the account associated with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to deposit USD into.
      amount - The amount of USD to deposit.

    • withdrawUSD

      public void withdrawUSD(String username, BigDecimal amount)
      Withdraws the specified amount of USD from the account associated with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to withdraw USD from.
      amount - The amount of USD to withdraw.

    • buyCrypto

      public void buyCrypto(String username, BigDecimal buyAmount, String cryptoSymbol)
      Buys the specified amount of a cryptocurrency with USD in the account associated with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to make the purchase from.
      buyAmount - The amount of the cryptocurrency to buy.
      cryptoSymbol - The symbol of the cryptocurrency to buy (e.g., "BTC").

    • sellCrypto

      public void sellCrypto(String username, BigDecimal sellAmount, String cryptoSymbol)
      Sells the specified amount of a cryptocurrency for USD in the account associated with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to make the sale from.
      sellAmount - The amount of the cryptocurrency to sell.
      cryptoSymbol - The symbol of the cryptocurrency to sell (e.g., "BTC").
